derivation: a primitive root; also interchangeable for H2820 (חָשַׂךְ)
outline:
1. (Qal) to love, be attached to, long for
  2. (Piel) fillet
  3. (Pual) fillet
kjv_def: have a delight, (have a) desire, fillet, long, set (in) love.
strongs_def: to cling, i.e. join, (figuratively) to love, delight in; elliptically; to deliver
